          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Gemini távcsövek</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Gemini telescopes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zwillingteleskope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les télescopes de Gémeaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os telescópios dos gemini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I telescopi dei gemini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα τηλεσκόπια Διδυμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los telescopios de los géminis</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Gemini-dél (chilei) távcső 8 m-es főtükrének szállítása a kupolához</string>
            <string language="en-US">Moving the 8-meter main mirror of the Gemini South (Chilean) telescope to the cupola</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">távcső</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászati távcső</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">lencsés távcső</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verschieben des Hauptspiegels 8-meter des Süd 
(chilenischen) Teleskops der Zwillinge auf die Kuppel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déplacer le miroir 8-meter principal du 
télescope (chilien) Du sud de Gémeaux à la coupole</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movendo o espelho 8-meter principal do 
telescópio (chilean) sul dos gemini para a cúpula</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spostando lo specchio principale 8-meter del 
telescopio (cileno) del sud dei gemini verso la cupola</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνηση του βασικού καθρέφτη 8-μετρητών του νότιου 
(της Χιλής) τηλεσκοπίου Διδυμων προς το θόλο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mudanza del espejo principal 8-meter del 
telescopio (chileno) del sur de los géminis a la cúpula</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
